translations: 日本工业标准（Japanese Industrial Standard）；喷气机升力系统（Jet Lift System）

sentences.sentence: Synchronization in the core JLS packages.
The JLS spells out the sequence explicitly.
sentences.translation: JLS 明确给出了这一顺序。

sentences.sentence: The RTSJ extends the core capabilities of the JLS in a number of ways.
sentences.translation: RTSJ 用多种方式扩展了 JLS 的核心功能。
